dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1488 IH: To repeal the authorizations for use of military force against Iraq.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meeks (for himself, Mr. Roy, Mr. Lieu, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Crane, Mr. Smith of Washington, Mr. Davidson, Mr. Crow, Ms. Hageman, Mr. Deluzio, Mrs. Luna, Ms. Jacobs, Mr. Massie, Mr. Casar, Mr. Gosar, Mrs. Cherfilus-McCormick, Ms. Mace, Ms. Perez, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Amo, and Mr. Brecheen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal the authorizations for use of military force against Iraq.

section.header: Repeal of Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution
section.text: The Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution (Public Law 102–1; 105 Stat. 3; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) is hereby repealed.

section.header: Repeal of Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002
section.text: The Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002 (Public Law 107–243; 116 Stat. 1498; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) is hereby repealed.
